name: ERC20 Metadata
description: Interface for the optional metadata functions from the ERC20 standard.

functionDecorators.name: Get token name
functionDecorators.description: Returns the name of this ERC20 token.

returnDecorators.name: Token name
returnDecorators.description: The name of this ERC20 token.

functionDecorators.name: Get token symbol
functionDecorators.description: Returns the symbol of this ERC20 token.

returnDecorators.name: Token symbol
returnDecorators.description: The symbol of this ERC20 token.

functionDecorators.name: Get ERC20 decimals
functionDecorators.description: Returns the number of decimals used by this ERC20 token.

returnDecorators.name: Decimal places
returnDecorators.description: Number of decimals used by this ERC20 token.
